summary:
"Batman & Robin" is a 1997 superhero movie about the DC Comics characters. It's the fourth movie in a series, directed by Joel Schumacher. George Clooney plays Batman, replacing Val Kilmer, and Chris O'Donnell is Robin. The film follows them fighting Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy's plan to rule the world.

After "Batman Forever" succeeded, Warner Bros. quickly made this sequel, aiming for a more toy-friendly tone. Despite making money, it was considered a flop and got bad reviews. Because of this, Warner Bros. stopped making Batman movies for a while.
title: Batman & Robin (film)
